data.enText: a piece of equipment shaped like a tube, containing lenses , that you look through to make objects that are far away appear larger and nearer
to look at the stars through a telescope
to become shorter, or make sth shorter, by sliding sections inside one another
to reduce sth so that it happens in less time

data.chText: 三集的内容被浓缩成了一个单独的节目。
data.enText: Three episodes have been telescoped into a single programme.

simple_means.memory_skill: tele 远 + scop 看 + e → 看到远处 → 望远镜

tr: a magnifier of images of distant objects

example: the novel was telescoped into a short play
In the accident, the cars telescoped
my hiking sticks telescope and can be put into the backpack

value.def: A telescope is a long instrument shaped like a tube. It has lenses inside it that make distant things seem larger and nearer when you look through it.

example.ex: It's hoped that the telescope will enable scientists to see deeper into the universe than ever before.
example.tran: 人们希望望远镜能使科学家看到比以往更遥远的宇宙深处。

trans: 空间望远镜；太空望远镜；望远镜；天文望远镜；空间千里镜
哈勃太空望远镜；哈伯太空望远镜；哈勃空间望远镜；哈勃望远镜；哈勃天文望远镜
反射式望远镜；反射望远镜；反射望遠鏡
折射望远镜；折射式望远镜；折射望遠鏡；折光式望远镜
消象差望远镜；消像差望远镜

partsOfSpeech.dec: tele 远，引申为“电” + communications 通讯 → 远程通讯 → 通信
tele 远，引申为“电” + gram 写，画 → 来自远方的信息 → 电报
tele 远，引申为“电” + graph 写，画 → 电报
tele 远，引申为“电” + meter 测量计 → 从远处测量的机器 → 遥测仪
tele 远，引申为“电” + path 感情 + ic …的 → 在遥远的地方也能感受到对方的感情 → 心灵感应的
tele 远，引申为“电” + pathy 感觉 → 在很远的地方就可以感觉 → 心灵感应
tele 远，引申为“电” + phon 声音 + e → 听到远方的声音 → 电话
tele 远，引申为“电” + scop 看 + e → 看到远处 → 望远镜
tele 远，引申为“电” + vis 看 + ion 表用品 → 看到远方的世界 → 电视
helio 太阳 + scop 观察；镜 + e → 太阳望远镜
macro 宏伟，大 + scop 观察；镜 + ic 某种药 → 从宏伟的角度观察 → 宏观的
scop 观察；镜 + e → 观察的范围 → 眼界
tele 远 + scop 观察；镜 + e → 望远镜
